## SimpleUserDelegate.onMessageReceived() method

Called upon receiving a message.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onMessageReceived?(message: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | <code>string</code> | The message received. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

Callback for handling incoming MESSAGE requests.
